item.description:
Wow, these walks have been great! We've had some good exercise, great laughs, and shared many interesting stories. Last week we also had Solomon, a meetup visitor from the UK, join us on the walk and dinner. We also celebrated a 50thbirthday! It really was a fun time. We never know what to expect on, or after, any given walk!

Now, some have been asking; “how much longer?”, so okay here’s my answer; we’ll continue with these walks until……….well, I’m not sure. I hear they make umbrellas, sweaters & jackets, boots & gloves, snow shoes, x-country skis, and even hand warmers! Hey, the way I see it, we really never have to stop until spring, when the snow melts and the FREE concerts come back! How’s that?

But let’s take one week at a time, and for this week, here’s the plan; Once again for those that can make it, we’ll start the walk at 5:10pm and take the illuminated pathway towards the “other” bridge. Later arrivers can meet us at the same place at around 5:50 pm when we return to the meetup location to repeat the walk again for a 2nd time.

Then after the walk, at ~ 6:30 we’ll head over the “jumper” bridge into Lowell to this Great Vietnamese restaurant that Diana knows, and recommends, for another “light” dinner. Anyone new joining us for the walk – great, we want to meet you, hear your interesting stories, and invite you to join us for dinner.

We’ll meet between 5:00 - 5:10pm at the concert park benches just across the street from Heritage Ice Cream & Restaurant. For those that don’t know me, you will. I’ll have a MEETUP pin on the back of my cap.

My cell No.  (603) 204-1657

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Let's Walk & Talk Along the River!
